vps_onboarding_description_3_us: Unlimited traffic and up to 2Gbit/s bandwidth
vps_onboarding_traffic_infos: For VPSs hosted in Sydney and Singapore: 1TB traffic/month for the Starter and Value ranges, 2TB/month for the Essential range, 3TB/month for the Comfort range, and 4TB/month for the Elite range. Bandwidth is reduced to 10Mbit/s once the monthly quota has been exceeded.
